short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inserts the current date and time at the cursor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Date Stamp tool: add the current date and time to editable fields.

Pending Stamp tool: adds "PENDING month/day" to the top of the text field.

TO USE:
Simply right-click on the field you would like to add a stamp and select one of the options under "Date Stamp".

Can also be triggered with shortcut. No setup required.

New in 0.90: You can now toggle which of the tools you would like to use in the popup.
